title: SIGSEGV on arm

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: O-Arm
labels.description: Target: 32-bit Arm processors (armv6, armv7, thumb...), including 64-bit Arm in AArch32 state

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Hello. I've been directed to create a issue here after a talk on one of the rust discord servers. Hopefully I got right.

So I'm trying to compile one of my projects on a Raspberry Pi.
``` 
nightly-armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf (default)
rustc 1.38.0-nightly (c43d03a19 2019-08-14)
Linux raspberrypi 4.19.58-v7+ #1245 SMP Fri Jul 12 17:25:51 BST 2019 armv7l GNU/Linux
```

However, something crashes, but I couldn't make much sense of it:

```andrei@raspberrypi:~/repos/x $ cargo build --release
   Compiling libc v0.2.61
   Compiling semver-parser v0.7.0
   Compiling autocfg v0.1.5
   Compiling rand_core v0.4.2
error: Could not compile `rand_core`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name rand_core /home/andrei/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand_core-0.4.2/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 --cfg 'feature="alloc"' --cfg 'feature="std"' -C metadata=75c38b01039d7ba5 -C extra-filename=-75c38b01039d7ba5 --out-dir /home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps -L dependency=/home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer
error: Could not compile `libc`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name build_script_build /home/andrei/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/libc-0.2.61/build.rs --color always --crate-type bin --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="std"' --cfg 'feature="use_std"' -C metadata=e5dc31559086ca86 -C extra-filename=-e5dc31559086ca86 --out-dir /home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/build/libc-e5dc31559086ca86 -L dependency=/home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (signal: 6, SIGABRT: process abort signal)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: Could not compile `autocfg`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name autocfg /home/andrei/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/autocfg-0.1.5/src/lib.rs --color always --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=ae28ae53598a464a -C extra-filename=-ae28ae53598a464a --out-dir /home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps -L dependency=/home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: Could not compile `semver-parser`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name semver_parser /home/andrei/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/semver-parser-0.7.0/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=b84782a7fa092166 -C extra-filename=-b84782a7fa092166 --out-dir /home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps -L dependency=/home/andrei/repos/x/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference)
```

What can I do ? Is this a compiler bug ?
